oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bob Wills interview - Ken Hightower
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Bob Wills (performer), conducted by Ken Hightower.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Opening theme -- Ken Hightower introduces Bob Wills -- Bob Wills talks about his first fiddle -- Bob Wills talks about how hard it is being a touring musician -- Wills talks about the driving force behind being a touring musician being the fans -- Wills talks about several generations before him in his family all played fiddle -- Wills talks about how his uncle was rated as Texas' number one fiddler -- Wills talks about never taking requests as a fiddler -- Wills talks about not wanting to push himself upon disc jockeys when he should've -- Hightower thanks Bob and concludes the interview -- Closing statement (Ken Hightower) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Wills, Bob, 1905-1975;
